Shalom Schwarz (; 8 March 1951 – 16 October 2014) was an Israeli footballer who played most of his career for Hapoel Hadera and also won 11 caps for the Israel national team.
Honours
Hapoel Hadera
* Israeli Second Division: 1969–70, 1972–73, 1976–77; runner-up 1968–69
Israel U19
* AFC U-19 Championship: 1971
